```py
>>> from scipy.special import iv, ive
>>> import numpy as np
>>> import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
>>> iv(3, 1000.), ive(3, 1000.)
(inf, 0.01256056218254712) 
```

```py
>>> fig, ax = plt.subplots()
>>> x = np.linspace(-5., 5., 1000)
>>> for i in range(4):
...     ax.plot(x, ive(i, x), label=f'$I_{i!r}(z)\cdot e^{{-|z|}}$')
>>> ax.legend()
>>> ax.set_xlabel(r"$z$")
>>> plt.show() 
```
